thread.title: Devils assign Reid Boucher to Albany (AHL); recall goalie Yann Danis
thread.title_full: Devils assign Reid Boucher to Albany (AHL); recall goalie Yann Danis

author: Rich Chere | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Devils assign Reid Boucher to Albany (AHL); recall goalie Yann Danis
text:
Comments 
NEWARK â€” After playing just one game this season, winger Reid Boucher was assigned to Albany (AHL) by the Devils Tuesday afternoon. 
The Devils also recalled goalie Yann Danis under emergency conditions to dress as Keith Kinkaid's backup in Tuesday night's game against the Nashville Predators . Cory Schneider, whose wife was due to give birth, was unavailable. 
Boucher, 22, did not score in the Devils' opening night loss to the Winnipeg Jets. He was scratched from Saturday night's game in Washington. 
In 35 career NHL games, Boucher has eight points (three goals, five assists). 
Danis was signed as a free agent this summer to give the Devils some veteran depth.
